feed.title: Serviceberry Blog
feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest Serviceberry news and events.

entry.title: Hosted Documentation
entry.summary: Thanks to many great tools for open source software, Serviceberry documentation is hosted. I'll be continuing to work on cleaning up. Please take a look at the Guides and the API Reference. Feel free to let me know what you think or let me know if you notice any errors or omissions.
